snippet.title: Chroma: Bloom and Blight Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Support us on Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1791832596/chroma-bloom-and-blight
Try the demo: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1140740/Chroma_Bloom_And_Blight/
Join our Discord:  https://discordapp.com/invite/J3cCfYz
Chroma on Twitter: https://twitter.com/ChromaCardGame
Chroma on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/chromacardgame/

Chroma: Bloom and Blight is a fresh and exciting competitive card game with a heavy focus on community and storytelling coming to PC and Mobile. We’re a team of experienced developers and passionate card game players from all over the world, working together to make our long-time dream a reality. The game is entirely free to play, there are no card packs. Instead all cards are freely available to everyone.

Contact us at:
baumi@chromacg.com
press@chromacg.com
